page.title: 10A day in my life
page.content: I walk to school with a couple of friends.When we arrive we go to our classroom which is a mobile classroom situated on the edge of the playground. We put our bags in the cloakroom and then go back outside to play football until 9.00a.m.At 9.00a.m a teacher comes into the playground and rings a bell,telling us to go inside to our classrooms. For the first tem minutes we do mental arithmetic.Then we go over to the school hall for assembly.Mr Murray,the headmaster,takes assembly.We sit in rows of classeswith the youngest at the front and the oldest at the back.There are about 260 children in the whole school but there are only 30 in my class.In assembly we sing songs, say prayers and listen to a story told by Mr Murray.Sometimes there are presentations and notices .
